https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/k1IgkuQYLGzw4vLArSIrjO3pt32.jpg A frustrated artist is convinced by his eccentric roommate to rob a bank. Having planned the crime by watching bank-robber films, the amateur heist is doomed from the beginning. A New Wave
